attributes.action: increase the number of skateparks for recreational use within Oldham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as the skateparks in Oldham are always getting ruined by people smashing bottles on it.

I feel that there should be wooden ramps as well because it does not hurt as much to fall on wood meaning people will try things more. There should also be walls around the skate park with proper gates that always get locked unlike Fitton Hill skatepark.
